content.en: Queueing algorithms: Algorithms are being used in various research studies to analyze and solve complex problems in queueing systems. These algorithms are helping researchers approximate system analysis, estimate performance measures, compute steady state probabilities, implement real-time scheduling, study workload processes, analyze performance with heavy-tailed distributions, and more. By utilizing algorithms, researchers are gaining insights into the behavior and sensitivity of these systems, enhancing approximations, and deriving exact solutions for various queueing models.
content.da: Kø-algoritmer: Algoritmer bliver brugt i forskellige forskningsstudier til at analysere og løse komplekse problemer i kø-systemer. Disse algoritmer hjælper forskere med at approximere systemanalyser, estimere præstationsmålinger, beregne steady-state sandsynligheder, implementere realtidsscheduling, studere arbejdsbelastningsprocesser, analysere præstationer med tunghalede fordelinger og mere. Ved at anvende algoritmer får forskere indsigt i adfærden og følsomheden af disse systemer, forbedrer approximationer og udleder præcise løsninger for forskellige kø-modeller.
